name: Circle Break
description:
Balance your way up, ready to pop out of the circles or break through the glass. Enjoy the challenge based special unlockables and test your skill with the ball you like

How to play:
- Tap anywhere on the screen to make your ball jump
- Time your jumps and dodge any obstacle
- Don't let it drop
- Smash through the glass lines
- Collect as many gems as you can

Features:
- Simple and enjoyable gameplay
- Intuitive controls, just a single tap
- Beat everyone's highscores! Now with online worldwide leaderboards!
- Improve your sense of timing and reflexes
- Combo system
